content:
here are no such laws.” . . .
7. Learning Machines
The reader will have anticipated that I have no very convincing arguments
of a positive nature to support my views. If I had, I should not have taken
such pains to point out the fallacies in contrary views. Such evidence as I
have I shall now give. . . .
The only really satisfactory support that can be given for the view ex-
pressed at the beginning of § 6, will be that provided by waiting for the end
of the century and then doing the experiment
